casebody.data:
Melvin HAYES v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 6664. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. June 9, 1961. Glenn R. Jones, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Lawrence M. Henry, U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before MURRAH, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed June 9, 1961, without written opinion, for the reasons stated in the trial court’s opinion, D.C., 194 F.Supp. 807.
